Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: painting of a harbor at dusk

Broad swaths of lavender and maroon coat the canvas, the cool shadows of a dusky sky warmed by the sunny hues of the stucco buildings depicted here. Heavy strokes of the paintbrush lend this piece an almost surreal quality, an impression of the scene bereft of any intricacy. The structures hug the muted tones of the harbor's depths lying central to the work, the waters girded by a cobblestone path of mottled greys. Street lamps dot the canvas at regular intervals along the water's edge, the pale golden halos a bright contrast against the otherwise subdued backdrop. Their glow casts a flourish of yellow brushstrokes upon the calm surface below, illuminating the solitary fishing boat anchored in the foreground. The silhouettes of two figures, one light and one dark, lounge atop the pointed hull, bereft of detail betraying the species or gender of their featureless forms. The signature 'lx' lies in the bottom right-hand corner of the canvas.

Broad swaths of lavender and maroon coat the canvas, the cool shadows of dusk warmed by the sunny hues of the buildings depicted here. This piece has an almost surreal quality, an impression of the scene bereft of any intricacy. The structures hug the muted tones of the harbor's depths lying central to the work, with street lamps at regular intervals shedding a pale yellow glow upon the calm surface below. A solitary fishing boat is anchored in the foreground, upon which lounges the silhouettes of two figures, one light and one dark.
